Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
313-315 Whitehorse Road, Balwyn VIC 3103

A PRIME INNER EASTERN INVESTMENT WITH GENUINE UPSIDE

A supremely prominent two level inner-eastern retail and office building in booming Balwyn

Fully refurbished throughout with high quality fit outs providing excellent depreciation tax benefits

A highly exposed ground floor retail frontage of 16.9 metres* and 12 rear car spaces

Leased to two highly established tenants with total income of $389,160 p.a** and fixed annual increases

Substantial land area of 717sqm* with rear access providing outstanding development potential (STCA)

Demolition clauses offering ultimate flexibility to the future owner

Located within Whitehorse Road retail and hospitality precinct and surrounded by Melbourne's most affluent eastern suburbs

For more information contact the exclusive sales and marketing agents below:

Rorey James

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: ASKING PRICE $6,500,000 - 6% YIELD*    /     A PRIME INNER EASTERN INVESTMENT WITH GENUINE UPSIDE

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
SOLD

+ Unrepeatable luxury permit approved for boutique development of 16 oversized apartments

+ Extraordinary 1,593sqm* Balwyn landholding with generous frontage of 25m*, overlooking Balwyn Reserve

+ A superbly located property in the lush tree-lined streets of Balwyn, one of eastern suburban Melbourne’s most establish and desirable residential locations

+ Surrounded by first-class education providers including prestigious Fintona Girls’ School less than 100m*, Camberwell Grammar 1km* and Genazzano College only 2km*

+ Excellent local amenity with Balwyn Park directly opposite and Balwyn retail village at the end of the street (100m*) featuring an array of local and national retailers including a Woolworths Supermarket, Palace Cinema, major banks and Laurent Café

+ Just 9km* from Melbourne’s CBD, with direct access via a tram line on Whitehorse Road, and Canterbury train station only 1.2km*

For Sale via Public onsite Auction on Wednesday 8th March at 12:30 pm

Open for inspection:

15th February at 11:30am
22nd February at 11:30am
1st March at 11:30am

For information please contact the sales and marketing team to register your interest.
